[ckMath -- Mathematics module]

A 3x4 matrix which is represented by four ckVecs. More...

Detailed Description

A 3x4 matrix which is represented by four ckVecs.

ckMat ckMat::rotateX_s32 ( s32  deg  )  const

Returns a ckMat which is this ckMat rotated around its x-axis.

This method allows only an s32 type as an angle, but is faster than its r32 version.

[in] z A length of translation along the z-axis. If not specified, 0.0f is used.

ckMat ckMat::slerp ( const ckMat &  to,
r32  ratio 
) const

Returns a ckMat which is interpolated between this ckMat and an another ckMat by the specified ratio, using spherical linear interpolation.

Parameters:
[in] to An another ckMat.
[in] ratio The value which indicates how far to interpolate between two ckMats. This value is clamped between 0.0f and 1.0f.
Returns:
A ckMat which is interpolated between two ckMats.

ckMat ckMat::slerp_noTrans ( const ckMat &  to,
r32  ratio 
) const

Returns a ckMat whose components except the translation is interpolated between this ckMat and an another ckMat by the specified ratio, using spherical linear interpolation, and whose translation is equal to the translation of this ckMat.

Parameters:
[in] to An another ckMat.
[in] ratio The value which indicates how far to interpolate between two ckMats. This value is clamped between 0.0f and 1.0f.
Returns:
A ckMat whose components except the translation is interpolated between two ckMats.

Returns a ckMat which is this ckMat converted from in the world coordinate system to in the local coordinate system of the specified ckMat.

Parameters:
[in] mat The origin ckMat of the local coordinate system.
Returns:
